alert.note: Alert for Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dare County through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grandy, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Southern Shores, Nags Head, Manteo, Sanderling, Colington, Whalebone, Duck Coe Pier, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wright Brothers National Monument, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Avalon Pier and Outer Banks Fishing Pier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
